characters.tip: Press 'shift + =' on your keyboard. Equal(=) is near backspace
Press 'shift + D' then press 'x' on your keyboard
Press 'shift + D' then press 'shift + hyphen' on your keyboard. Hyphen(-) is near the Backspace key
Press '=' on your keyboard. Equal(=) is near the Backspace key
Press '-' on your keyboard. Hyphen(-) is near the Backspace key
Press 'Shift + '' on your keyboard. Single quotes(') is near Enter key
Press '/' on your keyboard. Slash(/) is near right Shift key
Press 'K + `' on your keyboard. Backtick(`) is on the Tilde(~) key
Press 'K + (Shift + -)' on your keyboard. Hyphen(-) is near the Backspace key
Press 'K + D + /' on your keyboard. Slash(/) is near right Shift key. ക് + യ = ക്യ
Press 'K + D + (Shift + J)' on your keyboard. ക് + റ = ക്ര
Press 'K + D + B' on your keyboard. ക് + വ = ക്വ
Press 'K + D + N' on your keyboard. ക് + ല = ക്ല
സ് + റ് + റ  = സ്റ്റ. Type സ + press 'D' + റ + press 'D' + റ
Press (shift + C) + D + ]. Note: ണ with a cancelled root vowel.
Press V + D + ]. Note: ന with a cancelled root vowel.
Press J + D + ]. Note: ര with a cancelled root vowel.
Press N + D + ]. Note: ല with a cancelled root vowel.
Press (shift + N) + D + ]. Note: ള with a cancelled root vowel.

characters.character: വൈകുന്നേരം ചായ കുടിക്കുന്നത് ഒരു രീതി ആണ്.
